data.text: Amos babarima Yesaia adehu a ɛfa Babilonia ho ni:
Ma frankaa so wɔ bepɔw a hwee nni so no atifi,
Mahyɛ mʼahotewfo;
Tie huuyɛ bi a ɛwɔ mmepɔw no so
Wofifi akyirikyiri aman so,
Twa adwo, na Awurade da no abɛn;
Eyi nti, nsa nyinaa bedwudwo,
Wɔbɛbɔ hu,
Hwɛ, Awurade da no reba
Ɔsoro nsoromma ne wɔn akuw renhyerɛn.
Mɛtwe wiase aso, ne bɔne nti,
Mɛma onipa ho ayɛ na asen sika kɔkɔɔ ankasa
Enti mɛma ɔsoro awosow;
Te sɛ ɔwansan a ɔbɔmmɔfo rehwehwɛ no akum no,
Obiara a wɔbɛfa no dedua no, wobehwirew no afoa akum no;
Wɔbɛtotow nkokoaa ahwehwe fam wɔ wɔn anim:
Hwɛ mɛhwanyan Mediafo atia wɔn,
Wɔn tadua bɛbobɔ mmerante ahwehwe fam;
Babilonia, ahenni ahorow mu ɔbohemaa,
Nnipa rentena hɔ bio
Nanso sare so mmoa bɛda hɔ.
Mpataku bɛtena nʼabandennen mu,
